dialogue.introduction: Carrier Ryuuhou, remodeled from a Submarine Tender. I'll once again try my best as a carrier!
dialogue.library_intro: Carrier Ryuuhou, remodeled from a Submarine Tender. My speed was not up to plan specifications as there were issues with changing the boilers, but I have an enhanced flight deck and armaments as this Light Carrier class. Carrier Ryuuhou, giving it her all!
dialogue.secretary2: Unfortunate...? Bad luck? Eh, me?! That's just not true!
dialogue.secretary3: Doolittle? Somehow, the word doesn't ring well with me... Don't do anything...? Huh...?
dialogue.secretaryidle: A-D-M-I-R-A-L~ Admiral! Um... is Carrier Task Force deploying? Ah, a short break... I-I see, right...
dialogue.secretarymarried: Aren't you tired, admiral? Want to take a quick nap on my flight deck? Please do!
dialogue.wedding: Admiral... I thank you from the bottom of my heart for raising me as a remodeled carrier. I will always, yes, always be thankful. I'll always, always be part of the admiral's mobile squadron!
dialogue.show_players_score: Admiral, what is the situation like? Is it okay?
dialogue.equipment2: With this, I won't lose to the enemy's planes!
dialogue.supply: Thank you for replenishing my planes!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'll just be in the bath.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Apologies. This may be a long bath.
dialogue.docking_complete: Thank goodness, it seems like the reparation has been completed.
dialogue.ship_construction: Seems like a new friend has come.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: We've returned safely this time too. Phew.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Task force, deploying. I'll go with determination to win!
dialogue.battle_start: This feels great... First assault squad, launch!
dialogue.attack: There's more coming! Ryuuhou assault squadron, launch!
dialogue.night_battle: Moving into the chase. All ships, launch assault!
dialogue.mvp: My planes did great? H-hurray! This is the strength of the Carrier Ryuuhou!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Oh no, my flight deck hangar!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: They got me! The elevator has been... but don't worry, I'm not sinking!
dialogue.sunk: Sinking as a carrier... did I manage to accomplish a lot this time...?
dialogue.air_battle: Turkey?! Are you saying I'm one? I'm sorry, but we're the elite. Don't underestimate us!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, ah, um... even as a slow light aircraft carrier, I'm still sufficient enough for battles, right? Right? I believe so!

hourly.0000: It's midnight now. It sure has gotten late. Are you tired?
hourly.0100: 0100. Admiral, it's already late into the night, you know?
hourly.0200: 0200. Admiral, are you sure you don't need to rest?
hourly.0300: 0300. Geez, I'm starting to feel a little sleepy, too... I-I'm fine! Yawn...
hourly.0400: 0400. D-don't worry! I've been keeping myself awake by counting the number of Tenzan in my hangar.
hourly.0500: 0500. It's morning, Admiral! You're up early... don't tell me you stayed up all night...
hourly.0600: 0600. What should we have for breakfast? I guess curry is a little too heavy for the morning...
hourly.0700: 0700. Admiral, I tried making miso soup with fried eggs along with fried salmon fillets for breakfast. Dig in!
hourly.0800: 0800. Now, let's get through the day with zeal! Right, admiral?
hourly.0900: 0900. I want to clean the base. I'm off to do some sweeping!
hourly.1000: 1000. There sure is dust gathered. Give me a hand, Admiral. Here, hold this.
hourly.1100: 1100. Cleaning sure makes you hungry. What shall we have for lunch?
hourly.1200: 1200. Lunch today is Taige--er, I mean, Ryuuhou's specialty curry!
hourly.1300: 1300. How was my specialty curry? The potato was good too, right?
hourly.1400: 1400. Um, Admiral, it's time for the mobile squadron to- ah, not yet? Okay...
hourly.1500: 1500. Admiral, it's now time for the carrier squadron to sortie, right? Right?
hourly.1600: 1600. The seared sky sure is beautiful... it's already evening, huh.
hourly.1700: 1700. Have to prepare dinner soon. What would you like, Admiral?
hourly.1800: 1800. Since we had curry for lunch, I guess we should have something more exquisite...
hourly.1900: 1900. Admiral, I tried making Fricandeau Beef. How is it?
hourly.2000: 2000. How was the Fricandeau Beef? Hehe... great to hear!
hourly.2100: 2100. Admiral, want to go draft up tomorrow's operation plans after we clean up?
hourly.2200: 2200. Tomorrow WILL be the day when the mobile squadron get to sortie... Right, Admiral?!
hourly.2300: 2300. Admiral, this sure has been another tiring day. Shall we also do our best tomorrow?
